Week 48:

Saturday, December 3, 2022

  • The week was fairly quiet: I‚Äôm still having trouble getting enough rest, which leads to headaches and dizzy spells, but with enough breaks, naps, and beauty sleep I seem to be on a path to feeling better.
  • I‚Äôm continuing to settle back into work, and I love working on my own design assignment. I can see how much I missed the tangible, practical design work, as well as design collaboration.
  • Don‚Äôt tell A, but I indulged in a new Filofax setup for 2023. I got my hands on both their Week on Two Pages Diary, and their One Day on a Page Diary, to give myself ample space to organize. I‚Äôm quite exicted to try the week pages, which have a monthly planner section as well.
  • I watched Girl In The Picture, and all I can say is: I have quite the stomach for gruesome stories, but this shook me.
  • I also watched 15 Minutes of Shame and I loved it, particularly the connection they made to medieval punishment. It made me think back to my time as a student, getting acquainted with medieval literature for the first time.

My working notes

I write in public about what has my interest. Notes usually start out small (or empty), and grow as I do. The notes are densely linked, unfinished, possibly incorrect, and always ready for improvement.

Doing web things since 1997.

I'm Zinzy Waleson Geene (she/ they), a researcher, designer, queer facilitator, and IndieWeb advocate from Amsterdam. If you found anything on this website of value and want to say thank you, you can support me via Ko-Fi or PayPal.
